title: Trying to install LoL on 10.12 but no success....
body:
Hey everyone,

I'm new to Lol and some friends are wanting to me to play. Most of them are mac users but for some reason after I move Lol to my Applications folder after downloading the .dmg file, the icon will appear and load all the way and then disappear without doing anything else. I get no error message of any sorts and every time I try to reload the installer it just ask me if I want to terminate to previous installer... I've tried the following:

-Reinstalling and downloading a new .dmg file.

-Moving Userkernel(s) over.

-Copying over Userkernel from friends WORKING LoL file.

-Copying over project files.


So far its to no avail. Has anyone else had or having this issue and can offer advice to solve it? Thanks in advance!

replies.body: Your mac might be having an issue reaching our patching servers so nothing is coming up.  Start off by going through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to make sure your network is configured to get through.  Make sure to select Mac for instructions specific to your issue.  I hope that helps!
